November 05, 2025

Business AI Lab Wins the Northern Regional Round of the 2025 AI Olympic

Business AI Lab‚Äôs team NEU-LINH won first place in the Northern Regional Round of the 2025 AI Olympic. The team, consisting of three members from the Lab, showcased sharp analytical thinking and strong strategic execution to surpass many tough competitors. Other Lab teams, NEU-BAIL and NEU-TURNING, also earned recognition, reflecting the Lab‚Äôs solid academic foundation and effective mentorship.

October 01, 2025

üèÜ Congratulations to Dr. Luong Van Thien and Dr. Vu Huan for winning first place at the Ai City Challenge 2025! ü•á

Dr. Luong Van Thien and Dr. Vu Huan from Business AI Lab won first place at the AI City Challenge 2025. The VNPT AI engineering team achieved this remarkable victory in the category of object recognition from ultra-wide-angle camera data on edge devices. Their success demonstrates the strength of Vietnamese AI research and innovation on the global stage.
